DialogueTree.DisplayName: Guardian of Yunohira Tenbōsho Dialogue
DialogueTree.Description: Dialogue tree for Guardian of Yunohira Tenbōsho

Node.Text: [AI: Boss accepts challenge with intimidating response]
So, you wish to challenge me? Very well! I, Guardian of Yunohira Tenbōsho, guardian of Yunohira Tenbōsho, accept!
You've drawn first blood... Impressive! But this battle has only just begun!
Enough holding back! WITNESS MY TRUE POWER! I will defend Yunohira Tenbōsho with everything I have!
You're stronger than I thought... I must be more careful now!
*breathing heavily* I'm nearly finished... Will you show mercy, or end this?
[AI: Guardian of Yunohira Tenbōsho expresses gratitude/confusion at being spared, yields and offers weapon/gold]
[AI: Guardian of Yunohira Tenbōsho accepts fate with honor, makes desperate final attack]
You have... bested me... Yunohira Tenbōsho... is yours... You've earned it...
[AI: Boss protecting Yunohira Tenbōsho. Theme: Challenge, guardian, test of strength]
[AI: Guardian of Yunohira Tenbōsho responds warmly, mentions nearby locations: YunohiraTenbōsho1, SakurajimaKōFerrybaSpoke1Ring5]
[AI: Guardian of Yunohira Tenbōsho provides lore about Yunohira Tenbōsho]
[AI: Farewell message]

DialogueTree.DisplayName: Guardian of Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba Dialogue
DialogueTree.Description: Dialogue tree for Guardian of Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba

Node.Text: [AI: Boss accepts challenge with intimidating response]
So, you wish to challenge me? Very well! I, Guardian of Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba, guardian of Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba, accept!
You've drawn first blood... Impressive! But this battle has only just begun!
Enough holding back! WITNESS MY TRUE POWER! I will defend Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba with everything I have!
You're stronger than I thought... I must be more careful now!
*breathing heavily* I'm nearly finished... Will you show mercy, or end this?
[AI: Guardian of Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba expresses gratitude/confusion at being spared, yields and offers weapon/gold]
[AI: Guardian of Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba accepts fate with honor, makes desperate final attack]
You have... bested me... Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba... is yours... You've earned it...
[AI: Boss protecting Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba. Theme: Challenge, guardian, test of strength]
[AI: Guardian of Sakurajima Kō Ferry-ba responds warmly, mentions nearby locations: SakurajimaKōFerryba1, SakurajimaKasanHakubutsukanSpoke1Ring1]

*breathing heavily* I'm nearly finished... Will you show mercy, or end this?
